column5: My sister & I are heading for Uchi Lake Lodge August 20-27. This is first time my sister has been to an American Plan Lodge and she is looking forward to the experience. If 4x4bassin reads this I have sent you a message ,please reply before we go on this trip Thanks, In Advance Larry S
Good luck Larry, I am sure you will enjoy the fishing. FT
You mean you didn't treat her to your American plan cooking at Pusher.lol.Have fun up there.Thanks, In AdvanceLarry S[/QUOTE]
